results.p: Unicode is a character set. It translates characters to numbers. UTf-8 is an encoding standard. It translates numbers into binary. HTML5 UTF-8 Character Codes.

results.p: The recommended character set for MySQL is utf8mb4 . All new applications should use utf8mb4 . The utf8mb3 character set is deprecated.
